name: WATER'S FINE
description:
WATER'S FINE is an ENDLESS HUSTLE SIMULATION APPLICATION
Developed by OWCH for the WINDOWS ENTERTAINMENT SYSTEM

------------------------------------------------------------

CURRENT VERSION 0.2 - 5/17/2018
- SHOPKEEPER ADDED
- PALETTE EDITOR ADDED
- RUINS ENVIRONMENT ADDED
- ANALOG STICK SUPPORT ADDED
- VARIOUS TWEAKS TO GUI AND PLAYER CONTROL
- VARIOUS TWEAKS TO PROCGEN ALGORITHMS

------------------------------------------------------------

This game is in Open Development - it has no planned end state,
and will be updated with new content on an irregular basis
until the possibilities of the mechanics have been exhausted.

If there's something you'd like to see in the game,
let your wonderful voice be heard in the comments.

Thanks for playing!
- Jesse
